test_cases.title: Successful login using valid username
test_cases.preconditions: A registered account exists with a valid username and password
steps: Enter a valid username into the 'username' field
Enter the correct password into the 'Password' field
Click the 'Log In' button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the account dashboard
pre_verification_steps: Verify the user is currently on the Login page
Confirm that no active session exists (no 'Logout' or 'Dashboard' links visible)
post_verification_steps: Verify the URL has changed to the account dashboard
Confirm the presence of a 'Logout' button or user-specific greeting
Verify session cookies are present in the browser

test_cases.title: Successful login using valid email address
test_cases.preconditions: A registered account exists with a valid email and password
steps: Enter a valid email address into the 'username' field
Enter the correct password into the 'Password' field
Click the 'Log In' button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the account dashboard
pre_verification_steps: Verify the user is currently on the Login page
Confirm that no active session exists
post_verification_steps: Verify the URL has changed to the account dashboard
Confirm the dashboard displays information relevant to the account associated with the email
Verify session_status is updated to 'Authenticated'

test_cases.title: Login failure with invalid credentials
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Enter an unregistered username into the 'username' field
Enter a random string into the 'Password' field
Click the 'Log In' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed and the input fields remain populated with the entered values

test_cases.title: Correction of credentials after initial failure
test_cases.preconditions: A registered account exists
steps: Enter an incorrect password for a valid username
Click the 'Log In' button
Observe the error message
Clear the 'Password' field and enter the correct password
Click the 'Log In' button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is successfully redirected to the account dashboard after the second attempt
pre_verification_steps: Verify the user is on the Login page
Confirm no active session exists
Note the initial state of the login form (empty fields)
post_verification_steps: Verify that the error message from the first attempt is no longer visible
Verify the URL has changed to the account dashboard after the second attempt
Confirm session_status is 'Authenticated'

test_cases.title: Verify navigation to Forgot Login Info page
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Click the 'Forgot login info?' link
test_cases.expected_result: The browser navigates away from the login page to the password recovery workflow

test_cases.title: Verify navigation to Registration page
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Click the 'Register' button
test_cases.expected_result: The browser navigates away from the login page to the account registration workflow

test_cases.title: Login failure with empty fields
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Clear the 'username' field
Clear the 'Password' field
Click the 'Log In' button
test_cases.expected_result: An error message is displayed indicating that fields are required

test_cases.title: Login with special characters in username
test_cases.preconditions: An account exists with special characters in the username (e.g., user+test@domain.com)
steps: Enter the username containing special characters into the 'username' field
Enter the correct password into the 'Password' field
Click the 'Log In' button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the account dashboard

test_cases.title: Successful customer lookup with valid details
test_cases.preconditions: A valid customer record exists in the system matching the input data
steps: Enter a valid first name into the 'First Name' field
Enter a valid last name into the 'Last Name' field
Enter a valid street address into the 'Address' field
Enter a valid city into the 'City' field
Select a valid state from the 'State' dropdown
Enter a valid 5-digit zip code into the 'Zip Code' field
Enter a valid social security number into the 'SSN' field
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The page displays the appropriate recovery details for the matching account

test_cases.title: Error message displayed when no matching record is found
test_cases.preconditions: No customer record exists with the provided combination of details
steps: Enter 'NonExistent' into the 'First Name' field
Enter 'User' into the 'Last Name' field
Enter '999 Unknown St' into the 'Address' field
Enter 'Anytown' into the 'City' field
Select 'CA' from the 'State' dropdown
Enter '00000' into the 'Zip Code' field
Enter '000-00-0000' into the 'SSN' field
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The page displays an error message indicating that no matching record was found

test_cases.title: Validation error when First Name is left blank
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the 'First Name' field empty
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: A validation prompt appears requesting the user to complete the 'First Name' field

test_cases.title: Validation error when Last Name is left blank
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the 'Last Name' field empty
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: A validation prompt appears requesting the user to complete the 'Last Name' field

test_cases.title: Validation error when Address is left blank
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the 'Address' field empty
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: A validation prompt appears requesting the user to complete the 'Address' field

test_cases.title: Validation error when City is left blank
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the 'City' field empty
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: A validation prompt appears requesting the user to complete the 'City' field

test_cases.title: Validation error when Zip Code is left blank
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the 'Zip Code' field empty
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: A validation prompt appears requesting the user to complete the 'Zip Code' field

test_cases.title: Validation error when SSN is left blank
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the 'SSN' field empty
Fill all other required fields with valid data
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: A validation prompt appears requesting the user to complete the 'SSN' field

test_cases.title: Customer lookup with special characters in name fields
test_cases.preconditions: A customer record exists with a hyphenated name (e.g., Jane Smith-Doe)
steps: Enter 'Jane' into the 'First Name' field
Enter 'Smith-Doe' into the 'Last Name' field
Fill all other address and SSN fields with matching valid data
Click the 'Find My Login Info' button
test_cases.expected_result: The page successfully finds the record and displays recovery details

test_cases.title: Successful login with valid credentials
test_cases.preconditions: A user account exists with valid username and password
steps: Enter a valid username into the Username field
Enter the correct password into the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is successfully authenticated and redirected to their account dashboard
pre_verification_steps: Verify the user is currently on the Login page
Confirm that no active session exists (e.g., no 'Logout' button or 'Dashboard' link is visible)
post_verification_steps: Verify the URL has changed to the account dashboard
Confirm the presence of a 'Logout' button or user-specific greeting
Check that the session cookie or token is present in the browser storage

test_cases.title: Successful account registration with all valid fields
test_cases.preconditions: The registration form is loaded and empty
steps: Enter 'John' into the First Name field
Enter 'Doe' into the Last Name field
Enter '123 Maple St' into the Address field
Enter 'Springfield' into the City field
Enter 'IL' into the State field
Enter '62704' into the Zip Code field
Enter '555-0199' into the Phone # field
Enter '999-00-1111' into the SSN field
Enter 'johndoe_unique' into the Username field
Enter 'Password123' into the Password field
Enter 'Password123' into the Confirm Password field
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The account is created and the user is automatically redirected to the logged-in state/dashboard.
pre_verification_steps: Navigate to the Registration page
Verify that the email/username intended for registration does not already exist in the system (if searchable)
post_verification_steps: Verify the user is redirected to the dashboard or a 'Registration Successful' page
Confirm the session_status is active (user is logged in)
Navigate to the Profile/Account settings page
Verify that the user_profile fields (First Name, Last Name, Address) match the data entered during registration

test_cases.title: Login attempt with invalid username
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Enter a non-existent username into the Username field
Enter any password into the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays an error message indicating invalid login credentials

test_cases.title: Login attempt with incorrect password
test_cases.preconditions: A user account exists with a valid username
steps: Enter a valid username into the Username field
Enter an incorrect password into the Password field
Click the Log In button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays an error message indicating invalid login credentials

test_cases.title: Verify 'Forgot login info?' link functionality
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Click the 'Forgot login info?' link
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the password recovery or account retrieval page

test_cases.title: Verify 'Register' link functionality
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Click the 'Register' link
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the account registration page

test_cases.title: Login attempt with empty credentials
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the Username field empty

test_cases.expected_result: The system displays an error message indicating that credentials are required

steps: Enter the username with special characters into the Username field

Click the Log In button

test_cases.title: Registration with special characters in fields
test_cases.preconditions: The registration form is loaded
steps: Enter 'J0hn-Baptiste' into the First Name field
Enter 'O'Reilly' into the Last Name field
Enter '123/B @ Apt!' into the Address field
Enter 'St. Louis' into the City field
Enter 'MO' into the State field
Enter '63101-1234' into the Zip Code field
Enter '+1(555)000' into the Phone # field
Enter 'AAA-GG-SSSS' into the SSN field
Enter 'user_@.123' into the Username field
Enter 'P@ssword!' into the Password field
Enter 'P@ssword!' into the Confirm Password field
Click the Register button
test_cases.expected_result: The account is successfully created and the user is logged in, as no format constraints are imposed.

test_cases.title: Successfully open a new Savings account with valid funding
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page with at least one existing account containing $100.00 or more
steps: Select 'Savings' from the account type dropdown
Select an existing account from the funding source dropdown
Click the 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: A new Savings account is created with a unique account number and a $100.00 balance, deducted from the source account.
pre_verification_steps: Navigate to Accounts Overview
Note the current number of accounts in the account_list
Note the current balance of the funding source account
post_verification_steps: Navigate to Accounts Overview
Verify a new Savings account exists in the account_list
Verify the funding source account balance has decreased by $100.00
Click on the new account and verify the initial balance is $100.00

test_cases.title: Successfully open a new Checking account with valid funding
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page with at least one existing account containing $100.00 or more
steps: Select 'Checking' from the account type dropdown
Select an existing account from the funding source dropdown
Click the 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: A new Checking account is created with a unique account number and a $100.00 balance, deducted from the source account.
pre_verification_steps: Navigate to Accounts Overview
Note the current number of accounts in the account_list
Note the current balance of the funding source account
post_verification_steps: Navigate to Accounts Overview
Verify a new Checking account exists in the account_list
Verify the funding source account balance has decreased by $100.00
Click on the new account and verify the initial balance is $100.00

test_cases.title: Verify transaction integrity after account creation
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page with a known balance in the source account
steps: Select 'Savings' from the account type dropdown
Select an existing account from the funding source dropdown
Click the 'Open New Account' button
Navigate to the account details of the source account
test_cases.expected_result: The source account shows a debit transaction of exactly $100.00 and the balance is updated accordingly.
pre_verification_steps: Navigate to Accounts Overview
Note the current balance of the funding source account
Click on the funding source account and note the latest entry in transaction_history
post_verification_steps: Navigate to Accounts Overview
Verify the funding source account balance is exactly $100.00 less than the initial note
Click on the funding source account
Verify a new debit transaction of $100.00 appears in the transaction_history

test_cases.title: Attempt to open account with insufficient funds in source account
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page and selects a source account with a balance less than $100.00
steps: Select 'Savings' from the account type dropdown
Select the source account with insufficient funds
Click the 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays an error message indicating insufficient funds and does not create a new account.

test_cases.title: Attempt to open account without selecting an account type
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page
steps: Leave the account type selection empty
Select an existing account from the funding source dropdown
Click the 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays a validation error requiring an account type selection.

test_cases.title: Attempt to open account without selecting a funding source
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page
steps: Select 'Checking' from the account type dropdown
Leave the funding source selection empty
Click the 'Open New Account' button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays a validation error requiring a funding source selection.

test_cases.title: Verify unique account number generation for consecutive requests
test_cases.workflow: Open New Account with funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page
steps: Open a new Savings account
Note the generated account number
Open a second Savings account using the same funding source
Note the second generated account number
test_cases.expected_result: The system generates two different, unique account numbers for both new accounts.

test_cases.title: Verify Account Overview page layout and heading
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged into the application
steps: Observe the main content area heading
Check the sidebar navigation menu for the active state
Verify the presence of the account summary table
test_cases.expected_result: The main content area displays the heading 'Accounts Overview' and the 'Accounts Overview' link in the sidebar is highlighted.

test_cases.title: Verify account summary table columns and data population
test_cases.preconditions: User has one or more active accounts
steps: Locate the account summary table
Verify the table headers
Check that each row contains data for Account, Balance, and Available Amount
test_cases.expected_result: The table displays columns for Account, Balance, and Available Amount with data populated for every account owned by the customer.

test_cases.title: Verify total balance calculation logic
test_cases.preconditions: User has multiple accounts with varying balances
steps: Sum the values in the 'Balance' column for all account rows
Locate the 'Total Balance' value at the bottom of the table
Compare the calculated sum with the displayed total
test_cases.expected_result: The displayed total balance matches the mathematical sum of all individual account balances.

test_cases.title: Verify currency formatting for balances
test_cases.preconditions: User has accounts with non-zero balances
steps: Examine the 'Balance' and 'Available Amount' values in the table
Examine the 'Total Balance' value
test_cases.expected_result: All balance values are formatted as currency (e.g., including dollar signs and two decimal places).

test_cases.title: Verify display for a customer with a single account
test_cases.preconditions: User has exactly one account
steps: Count the number of account rows in the table
Verify the total balance row
test_cases.expected_result: The table shows exactly one account row and the total balance matches that single account's balance.

test_cases.title: Verify display for a customer with zero accounts
test_cases.preconditions: User has no open accounts
steps: Observe the account summary table area
Check for the total balance row
test_cases.expected_result: The table shows no account rows and the total balance is displayed as $0.00.

test_cases.title: Successful fund transfer between two valid accounts
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Transfer Funds page with at least two accounts available
steps: Enter a valid numeric value in the Amount field
Select an account from the From account number dropdown
Select a different account from the To account number dropdown
Click the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: The system processes the transaction and displays a success confirmation
pre_verification_steps: Navigate to Accounts Overview
Record the current balance of the source account
Record the current balance of the destination account
Navigate to Transaction History for both accounts and note the most recent entries
post_verification_steps: Navigate to Accounts Overview
Verify source account balance has decreased by the transfer amount
Verify destination account balance has increased by the transfer amount
Navigate to Transaction History and verify a new entry exists for the transfer with correct amount and date

test_cases.title: Transfer fails when Amount field is empty
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Transfer Funds page
steps: Leave the Amount field empty
Select an account from the From account number dropdown
Select an account from the To account number dropdown
Click the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: The system prevents the transfer and displays a validation error for the Amount field

test_cases.title: Transfer fails when From account is not selected
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Transfer Funds page
steps: Enter a valid numeric value in the Amount field
Leave the From account number dropdown at its default/unselected state
Select an account from the To account number dropdown
Click the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: The system prevents the transfer and displays a validation error for the From account selection

test_cases.title: Transfer fails when To account is not selected
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Transfer Funds page
steps: Enter a valid numeric value in the Amount field
Select an account from the From account number dropdown
Leave the To account number dropdown at its default/unselected state
Click the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: The system prevents the transfer and displays a validation error for the To account selection

test_cases.title: Transfer with minimum valid amount
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Transfer Funds page
steps: Enter '0.01' in the Amount field
Select an account from the From account number dropdown
Select an account from the To account number dropdown
Click the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: The system processes the transaction for the minimum amount successfully

test_cases.title: Transfer between the same From and To account
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Transfer Funds page
steps: Enter a valid numeric value in the Amount field
Select Account A from the From account number dropdown
Select Account A from the To account number dropdown
Click the Transfer button
test_cases.expected_result: The system either processes the transfer or displays a business rule validation error regarding identical accounts

test_cases.title: Successful bill payment with all valid fields
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Bill Payment form with a valid balance in the source account
steps: Enter 'John Doe' into the Payee Name field
Enter '123 Maple St' into the Address field
Enter 'Springfield' into the City field
Enter 'IL' into the State field
Enter '62704' into the Zip Code field
Enter '555-0199' into the Phone number field
Enter '987654321' into the Account number field
Enter '987654321' into the Verify Account number field
Enter '150.00' into the Amount field
Select a valid account from the From account number dropdown
Click the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: A confirmation message appears indicating the successful transfer
pre_verification_steps: Navigate to Accounts Overview
Record the current balance of the source account
Navigate to Transaction History
Note the most recent transaction entry
post_verification_steps: Navigate to Accounts Overview
Verify the source account balance has decreased by the payment amount
Navigate to Transaction History
Verify a new entry exists for the payment to 'John Doe'
Confirm the transaction details match the payment amount and date

test_cases.title: Error validation when required fields are empty
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Bill Payment form
steps: Leave all input fields empty
Click the Send Payment button
test_cases.expected_result: Validation error messages are displayed for all required fields

steps: Enter 'John Doe' into the Payee Name field

test_cases.title: Search by valid Transaction ID and Account
test_cases.preconditions: A valid Transaction ID exists for the selected account
steps: Select an account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Enter a valid transaction identifier into the 'Transaction ID' input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The results table displays the matching Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount.
pre_verification_steps: Navigate to the Find Transactions page
Verify the results table is empty or hidden before search
post_verification_steps: Verify the results table is now visible
Verify the Transaction ID in the results matches the input ID
Verify the Account column matches the selected account

test_cases.title: Search transactions with valid date and account
test_cases.preconditions: The Find Transactions page is loaded and at least one transaction exists for the selected date.
steps: Select an account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Enter a valid date in 'MM-DD-YYYY' format into the Date input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The results table displays matching transactions with Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount.
pre_verification_steps: Navigate to the Find Transactions page
Verify the results table is empty or hidden before search
post_verification_steps: Verify the results table is now visible
Verify all displayed transactions have a date matching the input date
Verify the Account column matches the selected account

test_cases.title: Search transactions with valid date range and account
test_cases.preconditions: The Find Transactions page is loaded and at least one account exists with transactions.
steps: Select a valid account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Enter '01-01-2023' into the 'From' date input field
Enter '01-31-2023' into the 'To' date input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The results table displays matching transactions with Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount columns.
pre_verification_steps: Navigate to the Find Transactions page
Verify the results table is empty or hidden before search
post_verification_steps: Verify the results table is now visible
Verify all displayed transaction dates fall between 01-01-2023 and 01-31-2023
Verify the Account column matches the selected account

test_cases.title: Search for transaction with valid amount
test_cases.preconditions: At least one transaction exists for the selected account with a specific amount
steps: Select an account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Enter a valid numeric value in the 'Amount' input field within the 'Find by Amount' panel
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The results table displays transactions matching the entered amount with columns for Transaction ID, Date, Description, and Amount.
pre_verification_steps: Navigate to the Find Transactions page
Verify the results table is empty or hidden before search
post_verification_steps: Verify the results table is now visible
Verify all displayed transactions have an amount matching the input value
Verify the Account column matches the selected account

test_cases.title: Search for amount with decimal places
test_cases.preconditions: A transaction exists with a decimal value (e.g., 100.50)
steps: Select an account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Enter '100.50' in the 'Amount' input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The results table displays the transaction matching the exact decimal amount '100.50'.
pre_verification_steps: Navigate to the Find Transactions page
Verify the results table is empty or hidden before search
post_verification_steps: Verify the results table is now visible
Verify the amount column shows exactly '100.50' for the returned records
Verify the Account column matches the selected account

test_cases.title: Search transactions for a single day range
test_cases.preconditions: The Find Transactions page is loaded.
steps: Select a valid account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Enter '05-15-2023' into the 'From' date input field
Enter '05-15-2023' into the 'To' date input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The results table displays transactions specifically occurring on 05-15-2023.
pre_verification_steps: Navigate to the Find Transactions page
Verify the results table is empty or hidden before search
post_verification_steps: Verify the results table is now visible
Verify all displayed transactions have the date 05-15-2023
Verify the Account column matches the selected account

test_cases.title: View Search Results
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in
steps: Navigate to the search results section
Verify search results is displayed correctly
Note the current values for verification purposes
test_cases.expected_result: The search results is displayed with correct current values

test_cases.title: Search with empty Transaction ID field
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Select an account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Clear any text from the 'Transaction ID' input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Transaction ID field indicating it is required.

test_cases.title: Search without selecting an account
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the 'Select an account' dropdown at its default/empty state
Enter a valid transaction identifier into the 'Transaction ID' input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the account dropdown indicating it is required.

test_cases.title: Search with empty account selection
test_cases.preconditions: The Find Transactions page is loaded.
steps: Leave the 'Select an account' dropdown unselected
Enter a valid date in 'MM-DD-YYYY' format into the Date input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the account dropdown indicating the field is required.

test_cases.title: Search with empty date field
test_cases.preconditions: The Find Transactions page is loaded.
steps: Select an account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Leave the Date input field empty
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Date input field indicating the field is required.

test_cases.title: Search with invalid date format
test_cases.preconditions: The Find Transactions page is loaded.
steps: Select an account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Enter a date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format into the Date input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Date input field indicating the format must be MM-DD-YYYY.

test_cases.title: Search with non-numeric characters in date field
test_cases.preconditions: The Find Transactions page is loaded.
steps: Select an account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Enter 'AA-BB-CCCC' into the Date input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Date input field indicating the input is invalid.

test_cases.title: Validation error when account is not selected
test_cases.preconditions: The Find Transactions page is loaded.
steps: Leave the 'Select an account' dropdown at its default empty state
Enter '01-01-2023' into the 'From' date input field
Enter '01-31-2023' into the 'To' date input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the account dropdown indicating the field is required.

test_cases.title: Validation error when date fields are empty
test_cases.preconditions: The Find Transactions page is loaded.
steps: Select a valid account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Leave the 'From' and 'To' date input fields empty
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: Inline validation messages appear next to the date fields indicating they are required.

test_cases.title: Validation error for incorrect date format
test_cases.preconditions: The Find Transactions page is loaded.
steps: Select a valid account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Enter '2023/01/01' into the 'From' date input field
Enter '2023/01/31' into the 'To' date input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears indicating that dates must be in MM-DD-YYYY format.

test_cases.title: Search with empty account selection
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the 'Select an account' dropdown unselected
Enter a valid numeric value in the 'Amount' input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the account dropdown indicating the field is required.

test_cases.title: Search with empty amount field
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Select an account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Leave the 'Amount' input field empty
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Amount input field indicating the field is required.

test_cases.title: Search with non-numeric characters in amount field
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Select an account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Enter 'abc' into the 'Amount' input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears next to the Amount input field indicating the input is invalid.

test_cases.title: Validation error for alpha characters in date fields
test_cases.preconditions: The Find Transactions page is loaded.
steps: Select a valid account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Enter 'Jan-01-2023' into the 'From' date input field
Enter 'Jan-31-2023' into the 'To' date input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: An inline validation message appears indicating the input is invalid or must follow the MM-DD-YYYY format.

test_cases.title: Search with non-existent Transaction ID
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Select an account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Enter a non-existent or random string into the 'Transaction ID' input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The results table is empty or displays a 'no results found' message.

test_cases.title: Search with special characters in Transaction ID
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Select an account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Enter special characters like '@#$%^&*' into the 'Transaction ID' input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The system displays an inline validation message for invalid input or returns no results in the table.

test_cases.title: Search for a date with no matching transactions
test_cases.preconditions: The Find Transactions page is loaded and no transactions exist for the chosen date.
steps: Select an account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Enter a valid date in 'MM-DD-YYYY' format that has no records
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The results table is empty or displays a message indicating no transactions were found.

test_cases.title: Search using a leap year date
test_cases.preconditions: The Find Transactions page is loaded.
steps: Select an account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Enter '02-29-2024' into the Date input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The search executes successfully and returns results or an empty table without validation errors.

test_cases.title: Search with date range where no transactions exist
test_cases.preconditions: The Find Transactions page is loaded.
steps: Select a valid account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Enter '01-01-1900' into the 'From' date input field
Enter '01-01-1900' into the 'To' date input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The results table is empty or displays a message indicating no transactions were found for the selected criteria.

test_cases.title: Search for amount that returns no results
test_cases.preconditions: No transactions exist with the amount '999999.99'
steps: Select an account from the 'Select an account' dropdown
Enter '999999.99' in the 'Amount' input field
Click the 'Find Transactions' button
test_cases.expected_result: The results table is empty or displays a message indicating no transactions were found.

test_cases.title: Successful profile update with all valid fields
test_cases.preconditions: The Update Profile page is loaded with existing user data
steps: Enter 'John' into the First Name field
Enter 'Doe' into the Last Name field
Enter '123 Maple Street' into the Address field
Enter 'Springfield' into the City field
Enter 'Illinois' into the State field
Enter '62704' into the Zip Code field
Enter '5550123456' into the Phone number field
Click the Update Profile button
test_cases.expected_result: A confirmation message is displayed indicating the profile was successfully updated
pre_verification_steps: Navigate to the Profile page
Record the current values for First Name, Last Name, and Address
post_verification_steps: Verify the confirmation message is displayed
Refresh the Profile page
Verify First Name is 'John'
Verify Last Name is 'Doe'
Verify Address is '123 Maple Street'

test_cases.title: Successful loan application with all valid fields
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Request Loan page with a valid account balance
steps: Enter a valid numeric value in the Loan Amount field
Enter a valid numeric value in the Down Payment field
Select a valid account from the From account number dropdown
Click the Apply Now button
test_cases.expected_result: The loan application is successfully processed and approved
pre_verification_steps: Navigate to Accounts Overview
Record the current balance of the selected 'From' account
Navigate to Loan History or Transaction History
Note the current number of records and existing loan statuses
post_verification_steps: Navigate to Accounts Overview
Verify the 'From' account balance has been updated (reflecting down payment or loan disbursement)
Navigate to Transaction History
Verify a new entry exists for the loan application/disbursement
Navigate to Loan Status page
Verify the new loan appears with a status of 'Approved'

test_cases.title: View Loan Status
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in
steps: Navigate to the loan status section
Verify loan status is displayed correctly
Note the current values for verification purposes
test_cases.expected_result: The loan status is displayed with correct current values

test_cases.title: Loan application fails when Loan Amount is blank
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Leave the Loan Amount field empty
Enter a valid numeric value in the Down Payment field
Select a valid account from the From account number dropdown
Click the Apply Now button
test_cases.expected_result: The process is not completed and a validation error for Loan Amount is displayed

test_cases.title: Loan application fails when Down Payment is blank
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Enter a valid numeric value in the Loan Amount field
Leave the Down Payment field empty
Select a valid account from the From account number dropdown
Click the Apply Now button
test_cases.expected_result: The process is not completed and a validation error for Down Payment is displayed

test_cases.title: Loan application fails when From account number is not selected
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Enter a valid numeric value in the Loan Amount field
Enter a valid numeric value in the Down Payment field
Ensure no account is selected in the From account number field
Click the Apply Now button
test_cases.expected_result: The process is not completed and a validation error for From account number is displayed

test_cases.title: Loan application with minimum valid numeric values
test_cases.preconditions: None
steps: Enter '1' in the Loan Amount field
Enter '0' in the Down Payment field
Select a valid account from the From account number dropdown
Click the Apply Now button
test_cases.expected_result: The loan application is processed successfully

test_cases.title: Loan application with large numeric values
test_cases.preconditions: User has a high credit limit or balance
steps: Enter '9999999' in the Loan Amount field
Enter '1000000' in the Down Payment field
Select a valid account from the From account number dropdown
Click the Apply Now button
test_cases.expected_result: The loan application is processed and the system handles the large values correctly

test_cases.title: Successful logout from the application
test_cases.preconditions: User is currently logged into the application and on a page where the logout function is visible
steps: Click on the logout function element
test_cases.expected_result: The user is redirected to the login page and the session is terminated.
pre_verification_steps: Verify the user is currently logged in
Confirm access to a restricted dashboard or account page
Note the presence of the 'Logout' button
post_verification_steps: Verify redirection to the login page URL
Confirm the 'Logout' button is no longer visible
Attempt to navigate back to a restricted URL and verify access is denied/redirected to login

test_cases.title: Verify session invalidation after logout
test_cases.preconditions: User has successfully clicked the logout function and is redirected to the login page
steps: Click the browser back button
test_cases.expected_result: The user is not granted access to the previous authenticated page and remains on the login page or is redirected back to it.

test_cases.title: Verify removal of sensitive account data from the UI
test_cases.preconditions: User is currently logged into the application
steps: Click on the logout function element
Inspect the login page for any persistent user-specific data (e.g., username, profile name, or account ID)
test_cases.expected_result: No sensitive account information or previous session data is visible on the login page.
pre_verification_steps: Navigate to the dashboard or profile page
Identify and note specific sensitive data displayed (e.g., username, account ID)
Verify the session is active
post_verification_steps: Verify the login page is displayed
Inspect the login page DOM and UI for the previously noted sensitive data
Confirm that username fields or welcome messages are empty or reset to default state

test_cases.title: Verify logout functionality when multiple tabs are open
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged into the application in two separate browser tabs
steps: Click on the logout function element in the first tab
Switch to the second tab and refresh the page
test_cases.expected_result: The second tab redirects the user to the login page, confirming the session was cleared globally.
